# Cost of Attendance

Through our extensive merit-based and need-based scholarship programs, we work to make Tulane as affordable as possible for each admitted student.

Below is our estimated 2024-2025 cost of attendance for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Newcomb-Tulane College who live on campus.

## Tuition & Fees

$68,678

## Housing on Campus

$10,758 (based on 2 students per bedroom)

## Meals on Campus

$8,110 (based on minimally required meal plan)

## Books & Supplies

$700

## Miscellaneous

Variable (e.g. one time orientation fee, health insurance if not covered by parents, laundry, etc.)

## Transportation

Variable depending on distance from campus

## TOTAL

$88,266+

It is important to note that the total cost of attendance at Tulane will vary depending on your enrollment status (full-time or part-time) and your residency (on campus or commuting).

In addition, our costs typically increase 3-4% each year, though our need-based financial aid offerings attempt to meet these annual increases.

For a more precise estimate of your cost of attendance based on your enrollment status and residency, visit our 【51†Student Accounts Receivable site†studentaccounts.tulane.edu】.

## Tulane 2024 Tuition & Fees and COA 

For the academic year 2023-2024, the undergraduate tuition & fees at Tulane University of Louisiana is $65,538. The graduate school tuition & fees is $66,046. The Living costs besides the tuition & fees is reported as $20,708 when a student lives on campus and $20,708 when a student lives off-campus.

Its total costs of attendance (COA) is $87,446 when a student lives on campus and $87,446 when living off-campus for the academic year 2023-2024. It includes tuition, fees, book & supplies costs, room & board, and other living expenses. The following table and chart illustrate the COA by living preferences and tuition rates.

Data source for 2024 College Cost: 【37†NCES†nces.ed.gov】, Last Update: March 12, 2024

 Tulane 2023-2024 COA On-Campus Off-Campus  
Total Costs$87,446$87,446  
Tuition & Fees$65,538  
Books & Supplies$1,200  
Room & Board$18,088$18,088  
Other Expenses$2,620$2,620   
Average Financial Aid$30,873  
Total Costs After Receiving Aid$56,573$56,573  

[Chart] 2024 Cost of Attendance

## Undergraduate Tuition & Fees

For the academic year 2023-2024, the undergraduate tuition & fees is $65,538. The undergraduate tuition rates are increased by 4.29% compared to academic year 2022-2023. 

 2024 Undergraduate Tuition & Fees 2021 2022 2023 2024  
Tuition & Fees$58,852 $60,814 $62,844 $65,538  

[Chart]2024 Undergraduate Tuition & Fees

## Graduate Tuition & Fees

For the academic year 2023-2024, the graduate tuition & fees is $66,046. The graduate program tuition rates are increased by 4.43% compared to academic year 2022-2023. 

 2024 Graduate School Tuition & Fees 2021 2022 2023 2024  
Tuition & Fees$61,176 $61,130 $63,244 $66,046  

[Chart] 2024 Graduate Tuition & Fees

## Tuition Per Credit Hour

For the academic year 2023-2024, the tuition per credit hour for part-time students or overloaded credits for full-time students is $2,550 for undergraduate programs. 

For graduate programs, the tuition per credit hour is $3,543. The tuition per credit hour are increased by 4.29% compared to academic year 2022-2023. 

 2024 Tuition Per Credit Hour 2021 2022 2023 2024  
Undergraduate$2,282 $2,362$2,445$2,550   
Graduate$3,167 $3,278$3,393$3,543  

[Chart] 2024 Graduate Tuition & Fees

### Books & Supplies

For the academic year 2023-2024, the average costs for purchasing books and course supllies is $1,200. The following table and charts illustrate the changes of the books & supplies costs at Tulane University of Louisiana.

 2024 Books & Supplies Costs 2021 2022 2023 2024  
Books & Supplies $1,200 $1,200 $1,200 $1,200  

[Chart] 2024 Books & Supplies Costs

### Living Costs

For the academic year 2023-2024, the average costs for living costs at Tulane University of Louisiana is $20,708 when living on campus and $20,708 when living off-campus . The on-campus living costs are increased by 4.34% compared to academic year 2022-2023. The off-campus living costs are increased by 4.34% compared to academic year 2022-2023. 

 Living Costs 2021 2022 2023 2024  
On-Campus Room & Board $16,248$16,778$16,248$18,088  
Other Expenses $2,380$2,440$2,380$2,620   
Off-Campus Room & Board $16,248$16,778$16,248$18,088  
Other Expenses $2,380$2,440$2,380$2,620  

[Chart] 2024 Room & Boards and other Living Costs

content.title: Tulane University of Louisiana 2024 Tuition & Fees

parts:
The estimated cost of attendance at Tulane University for the 2024-2025 academic year is approximately $88,266. This includes the following:

- **Tuition and Fees:** $68,678
- **Housing (on-campus):** $10,758 (assuming two students per bedroom)
- **Meals:** $8,110 (based on a minimally required meal plan)
- **Books and Supplies:** $700
- **Miscellaneous expenses:** Variable (e.g., orientation fee, health insurance, laundry, etc.)
- **Transportation:** Variable depending on the distance from campus

These costs can vary depending on individual circumstances such as living arrangements and personal expenses【6†source】【8†source】.
